mapper.select: select q_no, user_no, user_nickname, q_title, q_content, q_tag, DATE_FORMAT(q_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %r') as q_regdate, q_recommand, q_viewcnt from question where q_no > 0 order by #{filter} desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(q_no) from question where q_no > 0
select distinct count( p.project_no) from project p left join project_member m on p.project_no = m.project_no where p.pm_no=#{user_no} or m.member_no=#{user_no}
